<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 10.37
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	JOINDER TO LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Reference is hereby made to that certain Loan and Security Agreement, dated October 26, 2016, by and among The PrivateBank and Trust Company (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Lender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), BROADWIND ENERGY, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Parent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), BRAD FOOTE GEAR WORKS, INC., an Illinois corporation (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Brad Foote
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), BROADWIND TOWERS, INC., a Wisconsin corporation (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Towers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), and BROADWIND SERVICES, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,&#x201D; and collectively with Parent, Brad Foote and Towers, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Borrowers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,&#x201D; and each, a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Borrower
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), as the same may be amended or restated from time to time (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Loan Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	By execution of this signature page, the undersigned hereby agrees to become a party to, be bound by the obligations of and receive the benefits of the Loan Agreement as a Borrower thereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;All references to &#x201C;Borrowers&#x201D; in the Loan Agreement will be deemed to include the undersigned.
</FONT>
</P>

	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a&#8209;15(e) and 15d&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a&#8209;15(f) and 15d&#8209;(f)) for the registrant and have:

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

</TD>

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:13PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:13PT;WIDTH:13PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report, based on such evaluation; and

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES&#8209;OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In connection with the Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10&#8209;K of Broadwind Energy,&nbsp;Inc. (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2016, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#x201C;Commission&#x201D;) on the date hereof (the &#x201C;Report&#x201D;), I, Stephanie K. Kushner,&nbsp;President, Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes&#8209; Oxley Act of 2002 (&#x201C;Section&nbsp;906&#x201D;), that:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">

	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#x201C;Exchange Act&#x201D;); and
